body_html:
@soumith
It seems the fix doesn't work. The log is shown as following

Traceback (most recent call last):
File "demo.py", line 3, in
import model
File "/home/qianbb/github/chinese-ocr/model.py", line 5, in
from crnn.crnn import crnnOcr
File "/home/qianbb/github/chinese-ocr/crnn/crnn.py", line 72, in
model,converter = crnnSource()
File "/home/qianbb/github/chinese-ocr/crnn/crnn.py", line 64, in crnnSource
model = crnn.CRNN(32, 1, len(alphabet)+1, 256, 1).cuda()
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 222, in cuda
return self._apply(lambda t: t.cuda(device))
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 146, in _apply
module._apply(fn)
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 146, in _apply
module._apply(fn)
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 146, in _apply
module._apply(fn)
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/rnn.py", line 100, in _apply
self.flatten_parameters()
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/rnn.py", line 66, in flatten_parameters
if not any_param.is_cuda or not torch.backends.cudnn.is_acceptable(any_param):
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/backends/cudnn/init.py", line 87, in is_acceptable
if _libcudnn() is None:
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/backends/cudnn/init.py", line 58, in _libcudnn
'but linked against {}'.format(compile_version, __cudnn_version))
RuntimeError: cuDNN version mismatch: PyTorch was compiled against 6021 but linked against 5110

body:
@soumith 
It seems the fix doesn't work. The log is shown as following

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "demo.py", line 3, in <module>
    import model
  File "/home/qianbb/github/chinese-ocr/model.py", line 5, in <module>
    from crnn.crnn import crnnOcr
  File "/home/qianbb/github/chinese-ocr/crnn/crnn.py", line 72, in <module>
    model,converter = crnnSource()
  File "/home/qianbb/github/chinese-ocr/crnn/crnn.py", line 64, in crnnSource
    model = crnn.CRNN(32, 1, len(alphabet)+1, 256, 1).cuda()
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 222, in cuda
    return self._apply(lambda t: t.cuda(device))
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 146, in _apply
    module._apply(fn)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 146, in _apply
    module._apply(fn)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 146, in _apply
    module._apply(fn)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/rnn.py", line 100, in _apply
    self.flatten_parameters()
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/rnn.py", line 66, in flatten_parameters
    if not any_param.is_cuda or not torch.backends.cudnn.is_acceptable(any_param):
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/backends/cudnn/__init__.py", line 87, in is_acceptable
    if _libcudnn() is None:
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/backends/cudnn/__init__.py", line 58, in _libcudnn
    'but linked against {}'.format(compile_version, __cudnn_version))
RuntimeError: cuDNN version mismatch: PyTorch was compiled against 6021 but linked against 5110
